We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private RelativeStrengthIndex _rsi;
// In Initialize()
_rsi = RSI(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_rsi.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "RSI Moving Average Type", _rsi.MovingAverageType);
    Plot("My Indicators", "RSI Average Loss", _rsi.AverageLoss);
    Plot("My Indicators", "RSI Average Gain", _rsi.AverageGain);
    Plot("My Indicators", "RSI Is Ready", _rsi.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "RSI Warm Up Period", _rsi.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "RSI Current", _rsi.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "RSI Name", _rsi.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "RSI Samples", _rsi.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.rsi = self.RSI(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.rsi.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "RSI Moving Average Type", self.rsi.MovingAverageType);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "RSI Average Loss", self.rsi.AverageLoss);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "RSI Average Gain", self.rsi.AverageGain);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "RSI Is Ready", self.rsi.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "RSI Warm Up Period", self.rsi.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "RSI Current", self.rsi.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "RSI Name", self.rsi.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "RSI Samples", self.rsi.Samples);
